15 Staycation Spots Near Delhi NCR To Relax And Rewind

By Muskan
66933 Interested |
105K  Views
Photo courtesy: Lakelands

Staycations are evergreen, there's no right or wrong time to go on one. You could think of one if you want to celebrate something or when you're feeling like you need a break or 'just like that.' And if you have staycation on your mind and are looking for options for a staycation, fret not! We have done the research for you to pick the perfect staycation near Delhi NCR that doesn't go overboard and still suits your relaxation goals with pool, room service, activities and more! 

Overview

 
  1. 1. ITC Grand Bharat
  2. 2. The Westin Resort & Spa
  3. 3. Trident
  4. 4. The Roseate
  5. 5. Vivanta By Taj
  6. 6. Haveli Dharampura
  7. 7. The Gateway Resort Damdama Lake
  8. 8. Karma Chalets
  9. 9. Heritage Village Resort & Spa
  10. 10. Courtyard by Marriot Aravali
  11. 11. Andaz Delhi by Hyatt
  12. 12. The Barn
  13. 13. Tarudhan Valley
  14. 14. Themis Farm House
  15. 15. Noormahal Palace

Top Staycation Places Near Delhi NCR In 2025

ITC Grand Bharat

Photo source: ITC Grand Bharat
Photo source: ITC Grand Bharat
Photo source: ITC Grand Bharat

ITC Grand Bharat, Tauru

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Just a short drive from Delhi, ITC Grand Bharat offers a luxurious getaway to unwind in style. Set amidst the ancient Aravalli Range and spread across 300 acres, the resort honors India's glory with an architectural blend of ancient, medieval, and modern influences, featuring royal pavilions, ornate carvings, and domes. The expansive property includes 100 suites, four presidential villas, and elaborate culinary experiences. You can choose rooms with a private terrace or rooftop gazebo, while the suites come with their own living and dining areas. 

Price Per Night: INR 20,000 onwards

Google Ratings: 4.8/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 57 kms

Time Taken To Reach: 1hr, 39 minutes

Contact: +911 267285500, +91 8130279799 

The Westin Resort & Spa

Photo source: The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa
Photo source: The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa
Photo source: The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa

The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa, Sohna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Located on the slopes of Sohna, just about an hour from Delhi, The Westin Resort & Spa offers a relaxing retreat. Guess what? They even have a lake where you can go fishing! The hotel rooms include a private sitting area, while the standalone villas feature private pools and hammocks. For dining, visit Xiao Chi Restaurant, which serves classic Chinese dishes with a modern twist, and dont miss the Splash Poolside Bar for craft cocktails.

Price: INR 15,000 onwards per night

Google Ratings: 4.4/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 80 km

Time Taken To Reach: 2 hours, 2 minutes

Contact: +91124-7112233

Trident

Photo source: Trident Gurgaon
Photo source: Trident Gurgaon
Photo source: Trident Gurgaon

Trident Hotel, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon

See On Map
BOOK HERE

This hotel spans seven acres and features a blend of Mughal and Rajasthani architecture, complete with dome-shaped structures and courtyards. The rooms and suites overlook either beautiful natural scenery or the pool. Enjoy delicious food at Saffron, which serves Indian specialties like murgh malai tikka and lal maas, while The Bar offers champagne and Italian brut. Cilantro, an all-day dining area with cosmopolitan flavours, includes braised pork, Thai curry, and khao suey. Plus, we appreciate that the hotel is 100% solar-powered for all its electricity needs.

Price: INR 17,000 onwards

Google Ratings: 4.6/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 35 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 11 minutes

Contact: +91-124-2450505

The Roseate

Photo source: The Roseate New Delhi
Photo source: The Roseate New Delhi
Photo source: The Roseate New Delhi

The Roseate, Samalka, New Delhi

See On Map
BOOK HERE

It takes just one look to be completely mesmerised by the beauty of this luxury resort. Surrounded by plenty of greenery and water bodies, the resort features stunning architecture inspired by the five natural elements. Expect soothing temple bells, gigantic doors, high dome ceilings, and more. They take pride in their excellent service. With three distinct dining options, a luxury spa, an exclusive club, and even a boutique, they promise a stay that will delight your senses and cater to your shopping and clubbing needs.

Price: INR 11,000 onwards per night

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 18 km

Time Taken To Reach: 48 minutes

Contact: +91-124-2450505

Vivanta By Taj

Photo source: Vivanta Surajkund
Photo source: Vivanta Surajkund
Photo source: Vivanta Surajkund

Vivanta by Taj - Surajkund, Suraj Kund, Faridabad

See On Map
BOOK HERE

A trip to Vivanta by Taj, Surajkund, is an excellent choice for a convenient weekend getaway near Delhi. Its away from the main city but not so far that youll return exhausted from the drive. The hotel is designed in the form of ascending steps and overlooks the famous Surajkund Lake Complex. Theres plenty to dospend time in their large pool, book a spa session, or stop by their coffee shop for a latte. The best part? Your furry friends can tag along too!

Price: INR 4,500 onwards

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Reviews: Fabulous interiors, great hospitality, spacious rooms, but a little on the steeper side of the hill.

Total Distance From Delhi: 41 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 29 minutes

Contact: +9111 3015 8657

Haveli Dharampura

Photo source: Haveli Dharampura
Photo source: Haveli Dharampura
Photo source: Haveli Dharampura

Haveli Dharampura, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi

See On Map
BOOK HERE

A staycation at Haveli Dharampura allows you to experience all of Puraani Dilli in one place. The rooms feature traditional interior designs combined with modern comforts. The Mughal-era ambience is cherished and celebrated at the haveli, with captivating traditional Kathak performances every Saturday and Sunday, along with exquisite 7-course meals! This UNESCO certified heritage hotel is a very unique property with all the modern amenities one can need. 

Price: Starting at INR 12,666 per night

Google Ratings: 4.2/5

How To Reach: The closest metro station is Lal Qila.

Contact: +9111 49091777

The Gateway Resort Damdama Lake

Photo source: The Gateway Resort
Photo source: The Gateway Resort
Photo source: The Gateway Resort

Taj Damdama Lake Resort & Spa, Abhepur

See On Map
BOOK HERE

The Gateway Resort Damdama Lake features 78 rooms and suites designed for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Endowed with luxurious indulgence, the resort offers a multi-cuisine restaurant, Shamiana, a lovely spa for rejuvenating treatments and therapies, a large swimming pool, and a variety of outdoor activities, including golfing. They provide everything you could hope for in a luxurious getaway near Delhi NCR. The serene views of the lake and the Aravalli hills enhance the experience even further. It is especially great if you are travelling with kids, offering many fun activities that keep them entertained, like rain dancing.

Price: Starting at INR 25,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.4/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 64.5 km

Time Taken To Reach: 2 hours

Contact: 1-800-111-825

Karma Chalets

Photo source: Karma Chalets
Photo source: Karma Chalets
Photo source: Karma Chalets

Karma Chalets, Sector 80, Gurgaon

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Karma Chalet's landscaping and architecture evoke a fairytale ambience. This boutique property is nestled in nature and features rooms and suites that beautifully balance old-world elegance with contemporary design, showcasing aesthetic and ingenious details. The stay experience is truly cosy, making it the perfect spot for reconnecting with old hobbies like gardening and painting. If youre looking to take things slow, this is the ideal staycation destination near Delhi for you.

Price: Starting at INR 18,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 49.9 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 38 minutes

Contact: 1-800-111-825

Heritage Village Resort & Spa

Photo source: Heritage Village
Photo source: Heritage Village
Photo source: Heritage Village

Heritage Village Resort & Spa, Manesar

See On Map
BOOK HERE

For a royal retreat with the family, Heritage Village Resorts & Spa in Manesar is an exquisite resort that we highly recommend. The rooms feature vintage decor and a historical essence. They offer a wide range of complimentary weekend activities, including an organic garden tour, instructor-led RC aircraft activities, golf clinics, yoga with a professional instructor, cocktail demonstrations, golf cart rides, alpine camping experiences, Victoria carriage rides, wellness treatments, and more. The restaurants also serve exceptional Mughlai cuisine in a spectacular ambience. 

Price: Starting at INR 15,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.4/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 49.6 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 26 minutes

Contact: +91 90 1547 6476

Courtyard by Marriot Aravali

Photo source: Courtyard by Marriott Aravali Resort
Photo source: Courtyard by Marriott Aravali Resort
Photo source: Courtyard by Marriott Aravali Resort

Courtyard By Marriott Aravali Resort, Faridabad

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Courtyard by Marriott Aravalli is a luxury property ideal for a relaxed and indulgent staycation near Delhi. The rooms feature sleek, modern design sensibilities. We especially recommend their pet-friendly villas for a staycation, along with amenities like a spa, a kids' club, an activity center, and a gorgeous pool area that ensures a stress-free experience. Plus, you wont want to miss their spa center, which offers the most relaxing massages.

Price: Starting at INR 18,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 49.6 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 26 minutes

Contact: +91 129-350-0900

Andaz Delhi by Hyatt

Photo source: Andaz Delhi by Hyatt
Photo source: Andaz Delhi by Hyatt
Photo source: Andaz Delhi by Hyatt

Andaz Delhi, IGI Airport, New Delhi

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Located just seven minutes from IGI Airport, Andaz Delhi is a luxurious staycation spot that offers seamless connection to nearby hubs like Gurgaon, Dwaraka, and Yashobhoomi. Each of the rooms houses one of their 401 unique art pieces that portray Delhi's history and heritage. The hotel also offers more than 37,000 sq. ft. of meeting and event spaces that are ideal for small-scale business meetings and it's pet-friendly as well. Their in-house restaurant, Soul Pantry, holds workshops and events from time to time, like pizza making, so you can spend your evenings between scattered toppings and shared stories.

Price: Starting at INR 11,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour (approx.)

Contact: +91 22 7101 1234, +1 800 122 1234

The Barn

Photo source: Airbnb
Photo source: Airbnb
Photo source: Airbnb

The Barn - Chhattarpur

BOOK HERE

The Barn is a hidden gem in Delhi and is an underrated staycation spot for long weekends. It is a two-acre horse farm with cottages, nestled amidst gorgeous natural views. If you are looking for a romantic getaway in Delhi, not far from any sightseeing places, you should know that The Barn is situated close to landmarks like Qutub Minar, the Lotus temple, and Lodhi Garden. It is also a popular staycation spot for proposals, pre-wedding shoots, and a short romantic escape amidst a picturesque setting. Ideal staycation place for those looking for a unique getaway in the lap of nature, surrounded by the neigh of horses and a breath of fresh air. Horseback riding, visiting the stables, therapeutic walks with horses, dinner by the stables, bonfires and barbecues, often visited by peacocks: the barn is a staycation you will not move on from for long. 

Price: Starting at INR 7,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.5/5

Time Taken To Reach: 45 mins to 1 hours (approx.)

Tarudhan Valley

Photo source: Lemon Tree Hotels
Photo source: Lemon Tree Hotels
Photo source: Lemon Tree Hotels

Lemon Tree Hotel - Tarudhan Valley, Tauru

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Tarudhan Valley is one of the best staycation venues near Delhi. Surrounded by the peaceful and scenic Aravalli hills, it is nestled amidst a field of maize and mustard with cobbled pathways leading you ahead, while the scent of Frangipani or Plumeria flowers keeps your senses grounded. Spread around 72 acres, this resort near Gurugram envelopes a Standard 9-hole golf course designed by Graham Cooke, a celebrated golf course architect. You can get your furry friends along at this staycation spot as they have a demarcated play area for them. They house 70 contemporary rooms, including 18 studio apartments with kitchenettes, which offer a stunning view of the golf course. Their clubhouse hosts Skinners, a themed bar where you can unwind at after sunset. 

Price: Starting at INR 6,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.2/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 57.2 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 45 minutes

Contact: 01267 285 285

Themis Farm House

Photo source: Themis Farm House
Photo source: Themis Farm House
Photo source: Themis Farm House

Themis Farm House, New Delhi

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If you are looking for a leisurely staycation option near Delhi with not much to do but lounge by the pool and have a few drinks, then Themis Farm House should be on your radar. If you are taking your kids, you can keep them entertained with games including snooker, foosball, net cricket, volleyball, badminton, cycling, chess, ludo, and carrom. They host three luxurious rooms in one villa with private balconies, bathtubs and a fully-equipped kitchenette. You can also host events from small gatherings, proposals, to even weddings. 

Price: Starting at INR 30,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.2/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 45.2 km

Time Taken To Reach: 1 hour, 10 minutes

Contact: +91 99 9912 3300

Noormahal Palace

Photo source: Noormahal Palace
Photo source: Noormahal Palace
Photo source: Noormahal Palace

Noormahal Palace Hotel, Karnal

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If you are looking for a regal staycation in a palace hotel, then Noormahal Palace in Karnal is the closest one you can get to. Drenched in regal luxury and royal splendour, it is a five-star luxury palace hotel inspired by Indias rich heritage, offering a royal experience reminiscent of Indian Maharajas. A prominent wedding venue, Noormahal Palace brilliantly blends heritage, modern amenities, and beauty with a fusion of Rajputana and Mughal architecture. Their Sheesh Mahal is a lavish banquet hall with an adjoining lush green lawn, Rani Ka Bagh. The in-house restaurant, Frontier Mail, is themed after the Indian railways. Their in-house Polo Bar is reminiscent of a Texan watering hole. They have an inventory of 125 elegant rooms and suites that you can choose from, including the lavishly decorated Khwabgarh (Penthouse suite), perfect for a royal staycation near Delhi NCR. 

Price: Starting at INR 12,000 per night

Google Ratings: 4.4/5

Total Distance From Delhi: 122 km

Time Taken To Reach: 2 hours, 11 minutes

Contact: +919996787891/92/93/97/904
